meanings.definition: The quality of being delicious or appetizing.
meanings.sent1: The delectability of the chocolate cake made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The delectability of the fresh fruit salad was undeniable.
meanings.sent3: The delectability of the cookies tempted even the strongest willpower.
meanings.sent4: The delectability of the homemade soup warmed both body and soul.
meanings.sent5: The delectability of the dish lingered on their taste buds long after the meal.

meanings.definition: The ability to evoke pleasure or enjoyment through taste.
meanings.sent1: The delectability of the ice cream brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent2: The delectability of the pizza was evident from the satisfied smiles.
meanings.sent3: The delectability of the spicy sauce added a zing to the meal.
meanings.sent4: The delectability of the exotic spices transported them to distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The delectability of the treat was a delightful surprise for their taste buds.
